article.title: Lockheed Martin Receives $61 Million Contract for Future Force Rocket System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has received a $61 million follow-on contract for guided missile launch rocket system (GMLRS) unitary rockets. The GMLRS provides the U.S. Army, U.S. Marine Corps and the United Kingdom Defense Forces with a persistent, all-weather, rapidly-deployable, long-range precision strike weapon.
